data_description.npsso: Please supply the NPSSO token generated during successful login of your PlayStation Network account

user.description: To obtain your NPSSO token, log in to your [PlayStation account]({psn_link}) first. Then [click here]({npsso_link}) to retrieve the token.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate with new NPSSO Code

data_description.npsso: Please supply the NPSSO token generated during successful login of your PlayStation Network account

reauth_confirm.description: To obtain your NPSSO token, log in to your [PlayStation account]({psn_link}) first. Then [click here]({npsso_link}) to retrieve the token.
